intent_atoms.description: Provide an automated fixture catalog for task F1 that includes bundled metadata and a baseline QuickTime sample for ISOInspectorKit tests.
FixtureCatalog unit tests must confirm that fixture metadata is decoded correctly and resources are accessible, ensuring regression coverage.
The fixture catalog is bootstrapped as an automated component integrated with the test suite.
Expand the fixture catalog to include fragmented, DASH, and malformed assets along with validation expectations.
